meanings.definition: The act or process of transforming.
meanings.sent1: The transformations in the play were truly magical.
meanings.sent2: The transformations in nature during fall are breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: The transformations in the story made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The transformations in the painting were like a dance of colors.
meanings.sent5: The transformations of the caterpillar into a butterfly are a wonder of nature.

meanings.definition: A change in form, appearance, nature, or character.
meanings.sent1: The sudden transformations in the weather caught us by surprise.
meanings.sent2: The transformations in her personality were remarkable.
meanings.sent3: The transformations in the movie plot kept us guessing.
meanings.sent4: The transformations in technology are shaping our future.
meanings.sent5: The transformations in the garden brought new life to the space.

meanings.definition: A mathematical operation that changes the position, size, or shape of a figure.
meanings.sent1: The geometric transformations in the lesson were easy to understand.
meanings.sent2: The transformations in the graph showed a clear pattern.
meanings.sent3: The transformations in the equation made it look like a puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The transformations in the geometry project were visually striking.
meanings.sent5: The transformations in the shape of the building were impressive.
